products.name: LA LAGARTIJA
products.description: Mysterious and treacherous... The best choice for the start of your journey!

products.name: EL TIGRE
products.description: Really dark coffee, only for the real gourmets. Bitter flavor of grapefruits mixed with peanuts and caramel.

products.name: LA CUCARACHA
products.description: Sweet and intense with caramel, grapes, strawberry... Perfect for warm summer days.
